title: The Backstage Man: Imagination is a way of life
description: Whoever the Backstage Man may be - teacher or student, myth, memory or premonition - his story holds meaning for every person who has ever been called by the whisper of an inner voice. This book is an electrifying fusion of humor and philosophy, sex and spirituality, adventure, love, friendship, and, most of all . . . music.
author: Ed  Shankman
